author: dhokes
title: 2-3 week trip to Uttarakhand
text: # 1 I'm based in the UK and thinking about a 2-3 week trip to India around February-March 2015. I'm thinking about flying to Delhi and then getting the train to Dehradun. Then working my way back to Delhi visiting Rishikesh and Haridwar by train. 1. Would you suggest that route or would I be better off visiting Haridwar, Rishikesh and Dehradun in that order before returning to Delhi? 2. How long would you suggest such a trip would take given the things to do around those 4 places? 3. Would you recommend any other places around there? 4. I know this is really subjective and it depends on my lifestyle but on average, approximately how much should I budget for per day in those areas around February-March?
